change.when: "Identifier(s) of the text(s) on the conglomerate artefact
change.who: part: if there is more than one text on the conglomerate artefact
part:"Identifier(s) of the artefact(s) that pertains to the conglomerate artefact
part: if there is more than one artefact

resourceManagement.project: Identifier of the monument that pertains to the conglomerate artefact

compositeArtefactDescription.compositeArtefactID: write ""yes"" if you're encoding a case of reuse"

decoDesc.p: Number of plates observed within the set

compositeArtefactFormat.height: Number of plates estimated (but not observed)
compositeArtefactFormat.diameter: Indicate the presence of seal(s) by yes or no

copperplateFormat.sealHeight: Description of what is known or recorded about the origin and subsequent history of the artefact (free text)
copperplateFormat.sealWidth: Remarks on conglomerate artefact-related metadata (free text)

originExhib.originExhibPlace: Place where the artefact was originally exposed — don't fill in if place ID is already available

originPlaceID.id: ID of the place where the artefact was originally exposed

discoveryPlace.discoveryPlaceName: Place where the artefact was discovered — don't fill in if place ID is already available

discoveryPlaceID.id: ID of the place where the artefact was discovered

discoveryPlace.discoveryCoordinates: Coordinates if you have a specific topographic data

discoveryEvents.when: date of events (YYYY or MM-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or YYYY-YYYY)
date of events (YYYY or MM-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or YYYY-YYYY)

preservationPlace.preservationPlaceName: Collection or place (if the artefact remains in situ) where the artefact is currently preserved — don't fill in if collection ID is already available
preservationPlace.inventoryNumber: ID of the collection (institution or private collection) or place of preservation ID (if the artefact remains in situ)
preservationPlace.preservationCoordinates: date of events (YYYY or MM-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or YYYY-YYYY)

preservationEvents.when: date of events (YYYY or MM-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or YYYY-YYYY)
date of events (YYYY or MM-YYYY or DD-MM-YYYY or YYYY-YYYY)

preservationEvents.type: Institution or private person authorizing access to the artefact

compositeArtefactRights.governmentalHolder: Identifier(s) of the related surrogate(s). Use $ to separate the identifiers.
compositeArtefactRights.institutionalHolder: Identifier(s) of the related digital image(s). Use $ to separate the identifiers.
compositeArtefactRights.compositeArtefactDistributionRights: Link(s) to related images stored on external repository. Use $ to separate the identifiers.

textID.idno: Iconography and/or decoration observed on the artefact (free text)
